text: God Eblaham ñapay ne kɨdek yenɨgabal okok kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨl, tap olap gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglɨnɨm agɨl gos nɨgak. Anɨb ak Eblaham God nop gos lɨnɨgek God anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, adek anɨb ak Eblaham nop tap olap gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak. Binɨb takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak kɨdek gɨpal okok nep mel, binɨb mɨdupsek Eblaham God nop gos lɨnɨgak tek nepal okok, God kɨlop abe tap olap gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak. Eblaham, ne based chɨn mɨdupsek.
